list.title: V4.49t Release Notes
list.description: wip - Massive fixes and improvements. Not V4.5 yet.
updates: Was supposed to be during October, but delayed due to many tasks. Ends on December 20.
Fixed sizes, better user experience, and many more.
New UI, audio thumbnails, next/previous system, recents, crossfade, etc.
This includes certain bypassing methods and false positives where you couldn't say living room, skyscraper, etc.
Optimizations to maps, scripts, etc. Tidying up backend to make development easier. Performance is improved. Bugs are fixed.
This includes changes where new players won't be able to use private, recently created, moderated, or non-decal images.
TMP is now available for console!
Controller/gamepad-specific controls were implemented, why not add support for console?
You can now spoiler your morph (front/back side). To view it, click on the side(s) that say 'Spoiler'. This feature will be introduced to booths and image signs in future updates.
You can now have 1-sided morphs that follow your camera.
You can now have animated morphs with states for walking, jumping, sitting, etc.
Better mobile controls, improved details/sounds, better handling. Currently done for the Mecredenz CLS55.
Fixed an issue where keybinds/controls activated when typing.
Roblox introduced changes to their engine without notice that caused this issue in many games.
Fixed an issue where shadows and outlines were visible through morphs.
Implemented typing status to the chat interface.

Staff can spawn buses in the city map and do routes/shifts. No timetables yet. Stops and routes are currently limited, they will be expanded, fully functional, and available for all when the city map is expanded/big enough.
